title: RR31: Khan and Miri Make a Star Trek
content: It's time to finish up our Star Trek: The Original Series Season 1 journey with "Miri", "Space Seed", and a special guest! We promise not to bonk you on the head but we will certainly talk about the significance of Khan's first appearance in the franchise that led to The Wrath of Khan saving the franchise.  Next week we move forward in time to TNG with a brand new episode format! You don't want to miss it.  How do you feel about "Space Seed"? Does it hold up to time? Do you think it gets a bump because of The Wrath of Khan? Is "Miri" really that bad?  Comment below or hit us up @HeroesPodcasts on Twitter or Facebook!  Join our three-man crew for a journey that will span decades, every episode, every series, every movie, and every possible timeline no matter how small.  Don’t forget to subscribe to Redshirts & Runabouts! The links to iTunes, Blog Talk Radio,
